messages.message:
Do we have a way to create resouce based auth tokens? Our clients ask for a OAuth2 workflow like it's shown on this page:
https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/tfim/6.2.2.6?topic=overview-oauth-20-workflow

At the moment, we use our API token directly to perform all operations which is not ideal as per their cyber sec requirements

cc: @Paul @Aanchal Sharma @Veera @Piyush
No, but I brought this up to @Heymian for aihub api access. I think it’s going to come down to what is the effort to have something like this implemented
Correct, we don’t support this today, and likely don’t have bandwidth to look at this in the upcoming quarters either unfortunately.

Okay got it.

@Paul This will come up with MunichRe during SIT testing. We just have to put our foot down and say this is all we have at the moment. @Jason @Michael Do you have a recommendation on how to message this in order to make the customer feel more comfortable?
@Ed is looking at this as a part of our Authentication roadmap as he on-boards to doing this type of work
I think we understand the ask, but it would be good to have a session.
Our priority this quarter is supporting a federal setup, but we can get requirements lined up
@Venkatesh @Paul please loop in @Ed when needed on this topic.
Yes, let’s put our foot down on this one. Can I stay in the loop if we are considering any changes. want to make sure I know what we might be committing ourselves to on the engineering side.
